column1: Apply the rule only if the following conditions are met (leave blank for all products).
column2: Apply the rule only if the following conditions are met (leave blank for all products).

column1: Apply this rule with coupon only. You should configure coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first.
column2: Apply this rule with coupon only. You should configure coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first.

column1:
Apply this rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rule. You should configure the rule in Promotions / Shopping Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule.
Please note: "Use Auto Generation" option should be enabled in promo rule for it to be listed here.
column2:
Apply this rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rule. You should configure the rule in Promotions / Shopping Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule.
Please note: "Use Auto Generation" option should be enabled in promo rule for it to be listed here.

column1: Not apply this rule with coupon. You should configure coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first.
column2: Not apply this rule with coupon. You should configure coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first.

column1:
Not apply this rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rule. You should configure the rule in Promotions / Shopping Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule.
Please note: "Use Auto Generation" option should be enabled in promo rule for it to be listed here.'
column2:
Not apply this rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rule. You should configure the rule in Promotions / Shopping Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule.
Please note: "Use Auto Generation" option should be enabled in promo rule for it to be listed here.'

column1: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule every day
column2: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule every day

column1: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any store
column2: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any store

column1: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any group
column2: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any group
